title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up/down can be applied on more than one item. The signature preview is currently not wrapping properly. It would be nice if the signature preview had the background color set to the same color as hover.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog. The table should have a label to support a mnemonic. The selection should allow for multiple items. The signature preview should wrap properly. The signature preview should have the same background color as hover.
